name: api_audio_AudioClip

properties.name: ambisonic
properties.description: Returns true if this audio clip is ambisonic (read-only).

properties.name: channels
properties.description: The number of channels in the audio clip. (Read Only)

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: The sample frequency of the clip in Hertz. (Read Only)

properties.name: length
properties.description: The length of the audio clip in seconds. (Read Only)

properties.name: loadInBackground
properties.description: Enable this property to load the AudioClip asynchronously in the background instead of on the main thread. Set this property in the Inspector (Read Only).

properties.name: loadState
properties.description: Returns the current load state of the audio data associated with an AudioClip.

properties.name: loadType
properties.description: The load type of the clip (read-only).

properties.name: preloadAudioData
properties.description: Enable this property in the Inspector to preload audio data from the audio clip when loading the clip Asset (Read Only).

properties.name: samples
properties.description: The length of the audio clip in samples. (Read Only)
